goals__remit:
To foment and promoting CHP (combined heat and power generation) at all the Spanish territories and elsewhere necessary defending interest of existing facilities and promoting the erection of new plants, based in the essential characteristics of this technology  
- High Energy Efficiency 
- Primary Energy Saving 
- Electricity distributed generation 
- Emission reduction 
that justify the key contribution of this generation system to the security of supply and to sustainable development.
